radiographic_examinations.findings: Considerable demineralization, with compression fractures of T11, L1, L3, and L4.
radiographic_examinations.changes_over_time: Compression fractures confirmed on MRI performed one month before admission, showing uniform signal intensity in the marrow throughout the spine.

radiographic_examinations.procedure_name: Magnetic resonance imaging (MRI) of the spine
radiographic_examinations.findings: Compression fractures of the same vertebrae (T11, L1, L3, and L4), uniform signal intensity in the marrow throughout the spine.
Diffuse osteopenia of the thoracic and lumbar spine, with multiple compression deformities of the vertebral bodies; a periosteal reaction along the ulnar side of the midportion of the radius.

radiographic_examinations.procedure_name: Lateral radiograph of the lumbar spine
radiographic_examinations.changes_over_time: No further progression of the vertebral compression fractures post-treatment.

radiographic_examinations.findings: Improvement in bone density despite treatment.
